site_name: Access Storage Solutions, 12 Southend Arterial Road
description: Application for a non-material amendment to planning permission ref: P0219.19 dated 07/07/2019 to allow for relocation of two disabled parking bays from front to rear of site and creation of parking/unloading area at front of site, movement of cycle parking to new location at front of site, re-arrangement of parking and loading/unloading area at rear of site, removal of motorcycle parking bays, alteration to internal layout of ground floor, use of first floor for offices and storage, amendment to layout of office space of second floor, use of third floor for offices, amendment to design of entrances to east elevation, and creation of new entrance on ground floor south elevation. (Development of site to provide a 4 storey building to provide a mix use development of offices and storage with associated car and cycle parking, landscaping and plant)
decision_conditions: The amendments to the approved application listed below are considered to be of a minor nature and acceptable in their own right and will not require resubmission of a fresh planning application.
The following amendments are deemed to be accepted:
- relocation of two disabled parking bays from front to rear of site
- creation of parking/unloading area at front of site,
- movement of cycle parking to new location at front of site,
- re-arrangement of parking and loading/unloading area at rear of site,
- alteration to internal layout of ground floor,
- use of first floor for offices and storage,
- amendment to layout of office space of second floor,
- use of third floor for offices,
- amendment to design of entrances to east elevation, and creation of new entrance on ground floor south elevation.
The permission hereby granted does not supersede the previously imposed conditions.
